summary: This is an email chain from May 6, 2022, discussing logistical planning for victim assistance at Ghislaine Maxwell's upcoming sentencing in June 2022. An FBI Victim Specialist in New York is inquiring about the possibility of having victims present and confirming the sentencing date.

persons.name: MS Victim Specialist FBI New York
persons.context: The sender of the email inquiring about logistical arrangements for victim presence at Ghislaine Maxwell's sentencing.

events.title: Maxwell Sentencing
events.description: Planned sentencing date for Ghislaine Maxwell, with discussions about arranging for victims to be present.
personsInvolved: MS Victim Specialist FBI New York

keyFacts: The email discusses logistical planning for victim presence at Ghislaine Maxwell's sentencing.
The tentative sentencing date referenced is June 28, 2022.
The correspondence involves an FBI Victim Specialist from the New York office.
The email is flagged as external, indicating communication outside a secure government network.
The document reflects post-conviction, pre-sentencing coordination between law enforcement and victim services.
